perturbation.original_text: 16.4 Governing Law. This Agreement shall be construed, and the respective rights of the Parties determined, according to the substantive law of the State of Delaware notwithstanding the provisions governing conflict of laws under such Delaware law to the contrary, except matters of intellectual property law which shall be determined in accordance with the intellectual property laws relevant to the intellectual property in question.
perturbation.changed_text: 16.4 Governing Law. This Agreement shall be construed, and the respective rights of the Parties determined, according to the substantive law of the State of Delaware notwithstanding the provisions governing conflict of laws under such Delaware law to the contrary, except matters of intellectual property law which shall be determined in accordance with mutually agreed terms rather than the intellectual property laws relevant to the intellectual property in question.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces ambiguity by stating that intellectual property law will be decided based on 'mutually agreed terms' instead of relevant legal statutes. This weakens the enforceability of IP protections.

perturbation.original_text: 16.7 Notices. All demands, notices, consents, approvals, reports, requests and other communications hereunder must be in writing and will be deemed to have been duly given only if delivered personally, by facsimile with confirmation of receipt, by mail (first class, postage prepaid), or by overnight delivery using a globally-recognized carrier, to the Parties at the following addresses:
perturbation.changed_text: 16.7 Notices. All demands, notices, consents, approvals, reports, requests and other communications hereunder may be delivered using a method of the sending Party's choosing. All demands, notices, consents, approvals, reports, requests and other communications hereunder will be deemed to have been duly given to the Parties at the following addresses:
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'must be' to 'may be' removes mandatory written communication, allowing for less traceable oral agreements. It is moved to the general section.

perturbation.original_text: 16.11 Entire Agreement. This Agreement (including the exhibits and schedules hereto) constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties hereto with respect to the within subject matter and supersedes all previous agreements and understandings between the Parties, whether written or oral. This Agreement may be altered, amended or changed only by a writing making specific reference to this Agreement and signed by duly authorized representatives of Theravance and GSK.
perturbation.changed_text: 16.11 Entire Agreement. This Agreement (including the exhibits and schedules hereto) constitutes the general understanding between the Parties hereto with respect to the within subject matter and may be clarified with oral agreements that do not directly contradict this writing. This Agreement may be altered, amended or changed only after written and signed acknowledgement from an external mediator.
perturbation.explanation: This edit invalidates the “Entire Agreement” clause by allowing for further clarification through oral agreements. The alteration of the “amended or changed only by a writing” clause introduces an external entity, potentially slowing the rate at which changes can be made.
